attributes.action: collect the illness and region data
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we need a comprehensive percentage study on illnesses and its locations within uk.
This will further help the medical science to understand the causes of certain life threatning illnesses and come to a fuller understanding of the type of cure needed.
The conditions of the patient is detrimental to his/her location of residence.
we need these statistics published and available to the general public.
